note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, the prevalence of anxiety disorders is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Anxiety disorders prevalence vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Estimated share of people with  [anxiety disorders](#dod:anxiety_disorders), whether or not they are diagnosed, based on representative surveys, medical data and statistical modelling. The gross domestic product (GDP) per capita is measured in constant international-$.

display.name: Share of population with anxiety disorders

sourceDesc: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019); Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
